title: Punishing AFK players on Rework matches is bull-fucking-shit
body:
No I mean seriously. 
League of legends often simply decides not to connect to the match. It simply doesn't. It says it can't connect to the match.
It's fucking not my fault. It pisses me off. It always happens. I've done every single fucking thing to try to prevent it and it doesn't work.
But ok I'm living with that. Sometimes I get into matches after 4 or 5 minutes of trying to reconnect to the retarded server which keeps rejecting me.
Except that NOW I CAN'T BECAUSE THE MATCH IS OVER AND I HAVE TO PLAY 5 GAMES WITH A FUCKING 20 MINUTE QUEUE
You have zero idea how fucking infuriating that is.
If you can't make your game behave properly and connect to matches DON'T PUNISH PLAYERS BECAUSE OF IT!!!!!!!!!!
Really. 
Ugh.

EDIT: sorry for the childishly exxagerate use of F-bombs. I was just really pissed because this has been happening constantly since january 2015 and instead of Riot fixing it, they managed to make it exponentially worse.

replies.body: sometimes there is a load screen bugsplat, or the random "you have been disconnected" bullshit while you're on skype talking, clearly connected to the internet

Exactly. Which proves it's not my fault.
Besides other online games work flawlessly, how come only LoL fails to connect to the server?

It may not be your fault, but it's not Riot's fault either. You're not disconnecting on purpose, but the issue is on your end (or perhaps it's your ISP). Have you tried everything in the troubleshooting section on the support site?

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect

A valid argument, except I'm not the only one who suffers from that. 
I did try several things and while sometimes this ceases momentarily, it really never stops.
It begun about january last year (i've been playing since 2013) 
And it is absolutely annoying. The point of this is: If it's not my fault but they don't want to take responsibility for it, at least don't punish rework "AFK"s. I mean the point of Rework matches is that they will be erased from all records, and it was just 3 minutes. What's the point then?
Or at least idk only punish Rework AFKs on Ranked games. (I only play normal because normal players are already toxic enough, I really don't want to ranked.)

no, it's their fault, and i've called my isp and talked to anything and everything and it's not my fualt either. i've decided when i go to one of these esports events i'm gonna make so much attention that rito would have wished that listened to players.
